department: Transportation Research and Injury Prevention Centre
name: TRL702 Transport and health
description: Noise, air pollution, physical activity, and traffic injuries; estimation of traffic emissions inventory; health impact assessment; comparative risk assessment; population exposure; health burden; road, rail and air transportation; electric vehicles; disability adjusted life-years (DALYs); travel surveys and travel patterns; age and gender variation; metabolic equivalent of tasks; relative risks; dose-response functions; epidemiology; health surveillance
